title: Women's Balance - 100 Vegetarian Capsules
cleaned_text: Description For generations women in Asia have relied on a powerful potion to help nourish their bodies and maintain balance. Women's Balance is a special tonic that harmonizes the vital forces within promotes a smooth flow of energy and regulates the flow of blood. Not only that but it also helps improve digestion and promote overall reproductive health. Its reputation precedes it making it a must-have for any woman looking to feel her best. With Women's Balance you can find the serenity you need to thrive during menopause all thanks to its tonic herbs. Millions of women across the globe have used this formula and for good reason. From regulating your appetite to promoting healthy reproductive tissues this blend has got you covered. Get ready to say goodbye to stress response and hello to sound sleep and an improved mood. Calms Shen Soothes Nerves Benefits the Liver Nourishes Blood Traditionally known as Bupleurum and Dang Gui Combination Made with superior quality raw materials Oil trap captures all essential oils so they are in this herbal extract These statements have not been evaluated by the Food and Drug Administration (FDA). These products are not meant to diagnose treat or cure any disease or medical condition. Please consult your doctor before starting any exercise or nutritional supplement program or before using these or any product during pregnancy or if you have a serious medical condition. - MFG # 452 - UPC # 679372004529 [https://www.dragonherbs.com](https://www.dragonherbs.com) Ingredients Serving Size: 3 Capsules Serving Per Container: About 33 Amount Per Serving / %DV Proprietary Extract Formula 1500 mg / Bupleurum root Chinese Mint leaf Dang Gui root established. Other Ingredients: Pullulan polysaccharide** Rice powder Bamboo extract powder Rice extract blend. Non-GMO / No Starch / Gluten-free. Preservatives or chemical modification. Dosage Take 3 capsules 2 times per day or as directed by a healthcare professional. Precautions Keep out of the reach of children. Allergy / Dietary Needs - Gluten Free - Non-GMO - Starch Free
